title: AI Ethics for Everyone: A Practical Introduction
summary: Join us for a beginner-friendly workshop on the ethical implications of artificial intelligence in our daily lives.
description:
In this interactive session, we'll explore the fundamentals of AI ethics. We'll discuss real-world examples of algorithmic bias, data privacy concerns, and the societal impact of AI technologies. Participants will leave with a clear framework for thinking critically about AI and its role in shaping our future.

No technical background is required. This workshop is designed for community leaders, parents, educators, and anyone curious about the ethical dimensions of AI.

agenda.item: What is AI and Why Do Ethics Matter?

title: Phishing Prevention Masterclass for Small Businesses
summary: Learn to identify and protect your business from sophisticated phishing attacks in this hands-on workshop.
description: Phishing remains one of the biggest threats to small businesses. This masterclass provides practical, actionable steps to bolster your defenses. We will cover how to spot fake emails, secure your accounts with multi-factor authentication, and train your team to be the first line of defense.

title: Past Event: Navigating the Digital World Safely
summary: A look back at our community panel on digital safety for families and seniors.
description: This community panel, held in May, brought together experts to discuss practical digital safety tips for families and seniors. Topics included social media privacy, recognizing online scams, and fostering open conversations about technology at home.

title: Secure Coding 101 for Web Developers
summary: Learn the fundamentals of writing secure code and preventing common vulnerabilities like XSS and SQL injection.
description: This hands-on workshop is designed for web developers who want to build more secure applications. We will cover the OWASP Top 10, demonstrate common attack vectors, and provide practical guidance on writing defensive code.

title: Webinar: The Double-Edged Sword of AI in Cybersecurity
summary: Explore how AI is being used for both defending against and orchestrating sophisticated cyber attacks.
description: Join our expert panel as they discuss the evolving role of Artificial Intelligence in cybersecurity. We'll cover AI-powered threat detection, automated response systems, and the rise of adversarial AI.

title: Past Event: Managing Your Digital Footprint
summary: A recap of our community meetup where we discussed how to manage your online presence and protect your personal data.
description: This casual meetup focused on practical tips for individuals to understand and control their digital footprint. We covered social media privacy settings, data brokers, and tools for monitoring your online identity.

title: Panel: The Future of Data Privacy Regulations
summary: A deep dive into upcoming data privacy laws and what they mean for consumers and businesses.
description: With new regulations on the horizon, our panel of legal and tech experts will break down the complexities of the evolving data privacy landscape. Learn about your rights as a consumer and your responsibilities as a business.
